nodes.text: Old Jedha knots were a type of coin used as currency in Jedha City on the moon Jedha. The Guardian of the Whills Chirrut Îmwe would sometimes receive donations of Old Jedha knots along with Imperial credits and other currencies in the alms bowl he begged with in Jedha City during the reign of the Galactic Empire.
Old Jedha knots first appeared in the novel Guardians of the Whills, which was written by Greg Rucka and released on May 2, 2017.
